config¶

Module Contents¶

config.reference_genome = /tools/GRCh38_full_analysis_set_plus_decoy_hla.fa¶

Path to reference genome

config.debug = 1¶

Debug level

config.all_chromosomes = chr1,chr2,chr3,chr4,chr5,chr6,chr7,chr8,chr9,chr10,chr11,chr12,chr13,chr14,chr15,chr16,chr17,chr1...¶

List of chromosomes to analyse

config.no_threads = 4¶

Number of threads used for most of the tasks (if possible).

config.mem_per_thread = 16G¶

Memory per thread.
